overview: Liam Gallagher’s headline set at Glasgow’s TRNSMT festival was brought to a standstill last night when one overzealous punter scaled the rigging by the sound desk, prompting the former Oasis frontman to urge him to, “Jump, you shitbag – we’ve got a gig to do.”
title: Liam Gallagher: Live at TRNSMT 2018
